item.description:
hey folks, from NHC'er and arteest Sara T (whose work was featured at the opening of City Wide Open Studios at ArtSpace on Friday):

Hi friends. Here is the official invite to my studio. I have only done a few new things, but feel free to come and say hello
anyway, as it makes me happy.

Date: Saturday, October 20 & Sunday, October 21st

Time: 12pm - 5pm

Place: West Cove Studio & Gallery - at the corner of Elm &
Water in West Haven

Directions: Take 95S to exit 44. at the second light (I think) take a left onto Water St. It will be the first parking lot on
your left. Go up the large metal stairs to the gallery on the second floor.

Feel free to email if you need better directions, or have any questions! Please don't feel obligated - this is just if you're
curious :)

Best,
Sara

PS-Usually there is some sort of dinner/drinks festivity on Saturday night after the show...I like celebrating!
item.name: Sat. 10/20 - Sara T's Art Show!
